THE OHIO STATE UNIVERSITY
TELECOMMUNICATIONS CENTER
2470 NORTH STAR ROAD
COLUMBUS 21, OHIO
O ict
April 19, 1961
William Harley, President
NAEB
1346 Connecticut Ave., N. W.
Washington 6, D. C.
Dear Bill:
You may be interested in the enclosed photostats of letters
from Ribicoff and Cohn. Show them to Harold, especially
the one from Cohn. This confirms his hunch and mine.
Regards.
Sincerely,
Richard B. Hull
RBH/mh
Enclosures
Teaching Aids Laboratory • Office of Seminars and Workshops • Ohio School of the Air • Video Recording • WOSU—WOSU-FM—WOSU-TV • Closed Circuit TV
